statements: DELETE FROM CocktailPopularity WHERE popularity_score < 5 AND date_recorded < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM CocktailPopularity WHERE cocktail_name LIKE '%Margarita%';
DELETE FROM cocktail_popularity WHERE cocktail_id = 3 AND popularity_rank > 5
DELETE FROM ingredients WHERE category = 'Spirits' AND ingredient_name = 'Whiskey';
DELETE FROM cocktail_ingredients WHERE cocktail_id = 1 AND ingredient_id = 2;
DELETE FROM cocktail_history WHERE event_date < '2022-01-01' AND popularity_rating < 3;
